chapters.title: Chapter 11: The Nine Horse Hitch
chapters.info: Deane Aryman, p. 242 (173)—Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah about 1000 years ago. She was raised to the Amyrlin Seat after Bonwhin was deposed. She was born in Salidar and effectively saved the Tower from almost certain doom due to Bonwhin's actions. See also Amyrlin Seat.
